Header: Crawl is scheduled to be released in the United States on 12th of july
Content: Crawl is an upcoming American disaster horror film directed by Alexandre Aja. The film was written by Michael and Shawn Rasmussen. It stars Kaya Scodelario and Barry Pepper. During a fierce Category 5 hurricane that hits a Florida town, Haley Keller goes against the townâ€™s orders of evacuation in order to find her father Dave. Though finding him in a crawlspace basement of their family home in Coral Lake, the father and daughter realize that something sinister lives in the town. It is scheduled to be released in the United States on 12th of this month, by Paramount Pictures.
